analysis.description:
BurnupGameFinance._assignBuyoutProceeds (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol#1014-1062) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- burnupHolding.payBeneficiaries.value(fee)() (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol#1058)

BurnupGameFinance._sendFunds (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol#1122-1134) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! beneficiary.send(amount) (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol#1125-1134)

Reentrancy in BurnupGameFinance._assignBuyoutProceeds (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol#1014-1062):
	External calls:
	- referrer1 = burnupHolding.referrerOf(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol#1044-1045)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _sendFunds(currentOwner,currentOwnerWinnings) (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol#1023)
	- _sendFunds(beneficiary,totalDividendPerBeneficiary) (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol#1042-1043)
	- _sendFunds(referrer1,referralBonus) (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol#1045-1047)
	State variables written after the call(s):

	- totalPayments (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol#1045-1047)

totalDividendPerBeneficiary in BurnupGameFinance._calculateAndAssignBuyoutProceeds (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol#1098-1099) is a local variable never initialiazed

BurnupGameCore.buyoutAndSetReferrer (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol#1277-1288) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-burnupHolding.setReferrer(msg.sender,referrerAddress) (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol#1283-1285)

BurnupGameBase.canStart (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol#556-578) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timeOfWeek >= activeTimesFrom[i] && timeOfWeek <= activeTimesTo[i] (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol#575-578)

BurnupGameBase.tileTimeoutTimestamp (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol#615-639) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timeoutTimestamp >= currentTimeoutTimestamp (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol#636-639)

BurnupGameCore.buyout (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol#1149-1267) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(gameStates[gameIndex].gameStartTimestamp.add(gameSettings.initialActivityTimer) >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol#1201-1203)
	- require(bool)(gameStates[gameIndex].identifierToTimeoutTimestamp[identifier] >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol#1204)

BurnupGameCore._processGameEnd (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol#1313-1319) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- gameStates[gameIndex].penultimateTileTimeout >= block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/4/0xccfadbb9bd330452a7ea6e63787bed33e32d09fd.sol)
